website_summaries.verdict: Gaiam is one of the most trusted names in yoga. This well-designed 3-piece starter set has everything you need to move into yoga.
pros: Comes with a mat, 6-foot strap, and block
Comes with access to 2 workouts from well-known instructor Rodney Yee
While this has fewer bells and whistles than some other kits, Gaiam's quality and reputation are excellent
Lines on the mat help with placement
cons: Some people report an unpleasant chemical smell on the mat, which takes days to dissipate
Some people find Mr. Yee’s routines to be too advanced for a beginner
Some kits arrive without certain items

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting to try yoga for a long time, but I was intimidated by the fact that most classes are for advanced students, even when they claim they're for beginners. I have yet to really use the block yet, but the cd that comes with this kit is awesome. I use it about twice a week. I use the one for daily use, which lasts 20 minutes. Every time I use it I FEEL AMAZING. Within the first 5 minutes my back pops and feels so much better. I am becoming more flexible and don't feel intimidated at all by the workout. I recommend to anyone starting out that doesn't feel confident in trying yoga.
customer_reviews.author: Kortney Voss

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga set not just for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: The set came with a link to a beginners yoga video explaining how to use the yoga mat, block and strap. The video talked about the importance of posture and getting the positions correctly at a beginners level. I have a background in dance and know the importance of correct posture and position while stretching. I also found the block and straps helpful for using them to increase flexibility. The only star I did not give for sturdiness is that the mat has to be carefully rolled up and stored or the end of the mat might start bend a little of out shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The strap and block are good but the rubberi / plastic mat is still out-gassing ...
customer_reviews.text: The strap and block are good but the rubberi / plastic mat is still out-gassing after a few weeks. The strong odor is extremely obnoxious especially because many of the poses require you to be face down on the mat. The composition materials of this mat need to be changed so that the user is thinking about Yoga and not if what he or she is smelling is harmful at worst or just stinky at best.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Extejt

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would of started with this instructor sooner
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed getting started on beginning yoga. This instructor made yoga an important part of my daily routine. Not intimidating or complicated. Great start to learning how to increase your breathing and muscle controls.
customer_reviews.author: Gail C.

customer_reviews.title: Kit, great. DVD, meh.
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner at yoga and was very excited to find this kit. Everything was great, the mat is perfect size. The DVD..... it was interesting. I don't know what I was expecting. I guess more; breathing...stretching....*hummmmm*... although there are sections of the DVD that are "slow" or "relaxing" the instructor is very fast, by the time I got comfortable or figured out one pose he was finishing the next pose. I did indeed work a sweat it was most def not a relaxing sweat.
customer_reviews.author: cado406

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, but Not great! :)
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really good deal for the price. I love having the belt and yoga block as well (though lot of yoga poses require 2 yoga blocks). But as other reviewers have mentioned, it is quite slippery! Actually i have never had a mat that slippery. It’s still possible to do yoga (and i use it daily), but you have to be very careful in some poses not to injure yourself. It also had quite a strong smell when it arrived, but its fine now. Not the best, but works for my 2 months trip where I didn’t have my yoga equipment. :)
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Well made. Exactly what I needed for my yoga class. Some people complained that the mat and block had an odor. I noticed a slight odor but nothing that unrolling and letting it set overnight didn’t take care of. But honestly I would of used it right out of the package. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jmar

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set for my six-year-old niece who wanted her own yoga mat. She was thrilled at the colors as well as the block and strap. The mat is thin, and wouldn't be good for anyone with knees that need extra padding, and it smelled AWFUL when unwrapped. I opened it a week before Christmas to let it off-gas in the basement before gifting it.
customer_reviews.author: Dodd Alley

customer_reviews.title: if you're like me and bruise easily
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit and didn't check the contents for several weeks after it arrived due to unexpected travel. When I got home and opened the box I found that it was missing the yoga strap. Unfortunately, Amazon only gives 30 days for a return/exchange. Just a warning to check the contents right away if you don't plan using immediately. Also, if you're like me and bruise easily, you may want to get a thicker mat if using on hardwood floor. My knees, feet, and back hurt as this mat really good for keeping you from slipping and not for cushioning on hard surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Drey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this! I’m new to yoga, but this kit is perfect for beginners like me. It had everything I needed. The brick is sturdy as well and I have enjoyed that the mat keeps me off the scratchy carpet. It is the perfect thickness. I don’t slip very much, not nearly as much as I do on the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I have absolutely no experience with yoga and on suggestion from a friend came to Gaiam. This kit has everything you need to begin your path to wellness. The block and strap are almost essential for a first timer, they helped me understand the stability of each pose. One of the Dvd's shows you how to use them and WHY. Important for some. Very helpful for first timers. Rodney Yee has a very calming and clear voice. His instruction is simple and concise. For those beginning or those unable to find good beginner classes near by, this is an excellent start kit. The price can NOT be beat.
customer_reviews.author: madspeed

customer_reviews.title: Thin mat
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money for a beginner taking a “gentle yoga” class it perfect, however for regular yoga it’s ok. It not very thick so holding a pose on your hand can be uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: DVD sucks for beginners, other stuff is okay.
customer_reviews.text: The mat, block, and strap included in the kit certainly make it worth the money, but the DVD was very disappointing. This is supposed to be a beginners kit. I assumed that "beginner" meant someone who had never really done Yoga before. But the workout on the DVD that I tried was hard to keep up with. He mostly told you what to do by naming the poses, which didn't help me at all. There was no real discussion as to how the pose should feel so I knew whether I had myself positioned correctly. Maybe if I had already been doing yoga for a while, but definitely not as a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: V. F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for beginners, everything you need whether beginner or novice. Only gave 4*s bc the DVD is very fast paced and short. I just put yoga youtube videos up instead free and can find much better yoga instructors.
customer_reviews.author: Harlow

customer_reviews.title: Funky smell, moves a bit, but good value
customer_reviews.text: There is a definite smell to the mat even after having been left rolled out for a couple weeks. It also doesn't stay put very well and can bunch depending on the movement. I was looking for something cheap as I'm just starting to try so videos online and this was perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and delicious
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty thin mat but it adds a surprisingly comfortable amount of cushion. My two year old was so happy with this purchase that she bit a chunk out of the block. It's also not very wide. This is the first yoga mat I've ever owned, but I expected it to be a bit wider. I haven't watched the DVD yet, because I'm working my way through Yoga with Adriene's 30 Day Yoga challenge on Youtube, but I'll be watching this for the morning routine once that is done.
customer_reviews.author: KlPeterson

customer_reviews.title: Already has a rip after one use
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this gets 2 stars is because the first time I used my mat it immediately started to rip and tear. The block and band have held up phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: tab

customer_reviews.title: You get more than you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I've built an amazing habit after buying this product. Every morning, I follow the 20 minute yoga session that comes with this kit. The mat is good quality, the lines on it (the Cacoa color) help you understand where you're placing your hands and feet on the mat, the strap and block are essential to keep you doing the right form while your body gets flexible enough (will take time :)). Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Badereddin

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: The mat, strap and block were just what I needed to start my yoga class at the YMCA. Gaiam should consider increasing the price and include a bag.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Just received my order and it is missing the DVD. The box says it includes a digital download but that isn't in the box either. Terrible
customer_reviews.author: WalkingOnSunshine

customer_reviews.title: Gaiam Yoga Kit is great
customer_reviews.text: I received the order as expected. I am now very pleased with it. I did have to put the brick and mat outside for a couple days to air out to get rid of the strong chemical odor. It was so strong that I started feeling a little sick the first day I used it before airing it out. It appears that most of the less expensive mats are like this. The more expensive ones seem to have more of a rubber smell. Anyway, I would recommend it for the price and the CD is very good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Plante

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Great products for a beginner, intermediate or advanced yogi. Arrived as described. Quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: The mat that came with this kit is almost exactly the same color as pictured - maybe just a little more teal. It also comes with Chinese symbol design (not exactly my style but it is very tasteful so I don't think anyone will find them offensive). The yoga DVD isn't particularly good, but I wasn't expecting it to be very good - and even without the DVD the kit is a very good value. The strap is a very good length and the block seems sturdy enough. The quality is good and holds up to bi-weekly use
customer_reviews.author: J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Beginning Yoga
customer_reviews.text: Since I've never tried Yoga before, I have nothing to compare this to. However, I can see its potential benefit. I think some of the poses transition too quickly on the 20 minute workout since as a beginner, I am unfamiliar with the basic poses and their names. The first thing in the morning workout is great because it provides a good introduction and very good stretches and adequate time to transition. The only thing I wish either or both of the workouts offered were stretches for neck and upper back area, which is primarily why I even considered trying out Yoga.
customer_reviews.author: Sonjia Williams

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT COME WITH DVD OR DIGITAL DOWNLOAD AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to include routines/workouts - digital downloads and does not. Mat, block and strap seem like fine quality, but I specifically wanted the bundle as advertised. As of now I have reached out to “support”, if the routines DVD/digital download is not available I will be returning and just buy these items (at a lower cost) elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: My mom hated this video. I got it for her for her uncontrolled blood pressures. Thought the controlled breathing and relaxation would help reduce her blood pressures. My mom hates this video because of the guy, she doesn't like looking at half naked dudes. She did say the mat was very nice though. I think I will try getting her into Yoga with a different video.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Marie

customer_reviews.title: Non-standard brick size
customer_reviews.text: Nice starter kit although the brick is smaller than other Gaiam bricks sold separately and thus does not lend itself to work with other bricks
customer_reviews.author: Maria C. S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, affordable set for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I tossed the DVD since I did not find it the instruction on it to be helpful. It's way too fast for a beginner and does not focus on proper alignment and correctly doing the postures. Other than that, it's a great kit for beginners (like me)! The mat is good quality, travel friendly and not slippery. It has lines printed on it for alignment, I think, but one of the four prints have crooked lines so it defeats the purpose LOL. The others are fine though. Great, vibrant colour. The block and strap are on the smaller/shorter side but useful nonetheless. As a beginner, this definitely helps jumpstart my practice. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Okazaki N.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: I expected the mat to be a bit thicker, although looking back at the picture now I suppose that was my own lapse in judgement. I think the DVD is a bit hard to follow, especially being intended for beginners, but it was an overall good experience. I should have watched the prop intro but I started to figure it out on my own. Oh, and you need a folded blanket for the AM yoga sequence, this was not mentioned at the start of the video.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love Rodney Yee!
customer_reviews.text: A great high quality, well made, set that includes a yoga mat, foam block, strap and DVD. The Dvd is easy to follow and is easy to adapt to your personal needs and abilities. This set was well worth every penny I paid for it. I love Gaiam products, they make the best quality yoga gear and some really fantastic videos.
customer_reviews.author: Ricci O

customer_reviews.title: great for BEGINNERS!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect starter kit for a beginner and the shopping I did concluded that it is the best for your money. You can use the strap for workout and as a sling for your mat. The DVD is not intense Yoga but it's still a great workout. The work outs are a little slow but that's how yoga is. You will need to find a more advanced DVD if you want to pursue Yoga. All in all, if you are interested in Yoga, this is a great kit to help you start.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Good kit for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great mat for starters. It is beautiful and has vibrant colors.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Great for getting started
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to get started. Strap and blocks are great for beginners until you build flexibility. Mat is pretty. Happy with the purchase. Only thing that would be better is if there were 2 blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Good beginners kit!
customer_reviews.text: I thought the kit was really good. I wish i had bought it before i started other yoga routines. Gaiam has a different dvd called Yoga for beginners. I like the Pose Guide better and think it should have been included in this kit. I think it would help before you started moving fluidly through an entire routine especially if it is your first time. But the seated meditation is good.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Dupree

customer_reviews.title: Good set for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good starter yoga kit for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Charles Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Missing DVD!
customer_reviews.text: Opened box to find no DVD. Too many reviews about missing items in boxes! Ridiculous. Ordered a replacement and will have to see whether it even shows up with all items it's supposed to. Update: Replacement came with all pieces, however the DVD is terrible like others said. It's old & very fast. Not a beginners workout at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda D

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good mat. Wish it was a little thicker and came with a towel to lay on it so I don’t slip
customer_reviews.author: A. Liberato

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner set
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner set. Mat is thin but is okay for my use. All items seem very durable
customer_reviews.author: S. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good for a low price yoga mat
customer_reviews.text: It’s very thin more than I expected but the accessories are a great addition for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this was my friend, hoping she can learn to love yoga as much as I do. She has back problems. This was a great deal! Great quality. Nice yoga mat. Comes with block, strap and starter video. Great price for all that. It was packaged very well and delivered quickly. This is a great gift for anyone wanting to get started in yoga, for yourself or a friend! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: carol killian

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT kit for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift for the person who wants to start, or is just beginning, to practice yoga - everything they need is in this box. The included Rodney Yee video is offers two great introductory routines - his AM yoga workout is one of my favorites, and the energizing set for the afternoon delivers as promised. Add "Rodney Yee's Yoga for Beginners" video, and anybody can begin to enjoy the benefits of yoga in the comfort of their own home.
customer_reviews.author: Everyday K

customer_reviews.title: Must buy !
customer_reviews.text: Great product comes with everything you need for a beginner! And good price !
customer_reviews.author: ID

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to get into yoga, so when I stumbled across this starter kit I just couldn't resist the purchase! The block and strap that complement the mat aren't made of cheaper material, so you save A LOT of money by buying the kit as opposed to individual pieces. The DVD is alright. I'll probably replace it with a different one but for now it does exactly what I want it to- get me into doing some basic yoga! Not to mention that you get a pretty good workout/stretch from it. My arms/legs felt like jello after doing the daily routine for the first time. Overall GREAT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi McLean

customer_reviews.title: She loved it. The DVD is has some pretty good ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kit for my mom who is new to yoga. She loved it. The DVD is has some pretty good information as well. I would recommend this product, actually I wish I had bought this kit when I was new to yoga. I do really like the Gaiam products.
customer_reviews.author: sky

customer_reviews.title: The quality is not bad, though
customer_reviews.text: Did not have any issues with a strong chemical odor, but the mat is a bit thin. The quality is not bad, though, and so far no issues after 3 months of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Asfoora

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set for the beginner with yoga
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for the beginner with yoga. The reason I gave 3 stars is because the DVD that comes with the kit I don't think is geared towards the beginner. He goes very fast with exercises and does not explain what you need to be doing to properly get in the correct position. Other than that, the mat and brick are great. Have not used the strap yet so cannot say anything about it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality package
customer_reviews.text: I got this because for the price of many mats I was able to get a block and strap as well. I didn't watch the DVD. But the mat has been great. The block is softer than the ones I've used in the past, but still works great! The strap is just a regular yoga strap and serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a giveaway and the recipient says she uses the kit a couple times a week. Nothing fancy, great for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: YogaGrl83

customer_reviews.title: Slippery at first, but then great!
customer_reviews.text: I got this combo because it’s a great deal with the block & strap as well. The mat was a bit too slippery for about the first week until it was broken in a bit. The block feels stable & not too soft & the strap is great for deeper stretches. The print on the mat is actually beautiful & I’m happy I gave it a chance, I use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: WOULD LIKE MY DVD
customer_reviews.text: WOULD HAVE GIVEN 5 STAR.... BUT NO DVD!!!!!! DVD MISSING AND SETUP PAPER SHREDDED!! WOULD LIKE MY DVD PLEASE
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Great mat but i recommend laying it outside for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great mat but i recommend laying it outside for a couple of days to let it air out and release the chemical odor.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginners Package
customer_reviews.text: This set was exactly what I expected and meets the needs of this beginner perfectly. I had read some mixed reviews about the mat itself. What I received is thin, but still thick enough to provide comfort on my tile floor. Also, the video is a good introduction. I have been using the Morning Yoga regularly and enjoy the warm up to the day. If you are looking for serious Yoga routines, this IS a beginners set, you will certainly want to supplement with more videos/classes etc. The block and strap are also of quality build and perform as expected. All in all, it's a complete and quality package perfect for someone starting out.
customer_reviews.author: sharon hammond

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is so pretty not as thick as I would like but great for the cost!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nakia

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid yoga set and a great value for the price. Everything has held up really nicely and I like the lines on the mat to help with alignment. There was a very strong chemical smell when it first arrived, but it went away after a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Rhianne

customer_reviews.title: Nice beginning set
customer_reviews.text: I got into yoga at my local ymca, and decided to look for beginning dvds. My instructor recommended Rodney Yee, this kit included a very nice beginner dvd with an A.M. workout and other workouts for beginners, a nice mat, block and strap. The dvd is easy enough to follow and quick enough, if your busy busy busy you can find time for it. I'm very happy with Gaiam products so far and will look for more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dayas M. Silvis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: I do yoga at home using YouTube videos 3 times a week. I have carpeted floors, so I didn't think I ever really needed a mat. Decided to go ahead and give it a shot, and had no idea it would make such a difference! When I first got the mat, I unrolled it and let it sit out for a couple of days (as per other review recommendations), but it didn't have a terrible odor to start with. I highly recommend this product for anyone new to yoga.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great products.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. I love the DVD that this came with, it truly is easy to follow. The mat is durable, and helps me not slide while doing my yoga. The strap is useful, and the DVD instructs you how to use this in a routine. The block is great and sturdy to use as well. The value for all of items given was remarkable.
customer_reviews.author: Simply Kristi M

customer_reviews.title: ... teacher say to me that this is a very nice mat and it helps a lot with the design ...
customer_reviews.text: My yoga teacher say to me that this is a very nice mat and it helps a lot with the design that it hads. The only thing is that when Im sweaty slips a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I had tried yoga before and wanted to start doing it on a daily basis. This kit was great for beginning yoga, but be sure you're ready because it starts quickly. And make sure you TRY the positions you don't think you can do! I'm quite overweight but I could do all of them at least 90% of the way when I didn't think I could, and I haven't exercised in YEARS. Great product and awesome deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen H

customer_reviews.title: Great set for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great set for beginners. I got this for my daughter and she likes the color and the block is a nice size for stretching.
customer_reviews.author: ms

customer_reviews.title: New to yoga
customer_reviews.text: The mat is nice for a beginner. The DVD is informational however being one that has never done yoga before I need to stop and jump back on DVD to see what I am doing. I would recommend this for beginners. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Suzi

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a yoga beginner
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a family member for Xmas that I thought might enjoy yoga, turns out I was right :-) She's very happy with the kit and to have something to get her started before she ventures off to group classes. Great little investment for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like everything but the DVD is not really for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I like everything but the DVD is not really for beginners. It moves really fast and I can't keep up with it. It doesn't go through the different poses so it is very hard to keep up and know what you are doing. Other than that it's great
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Cronkhite

customer_reviews.title: Yoga Without the Pressure
customer_reviews.text: Don't you just hate it when you show up for a class and everyone is tying themselves up in pretzels while you trip tying your shoes? If "downward dog" makes you break out in a sweat, it's totally okay! Build your core in peace and then join the class.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Buys (and Tries) Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Great starter
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to start doing yoga. I bought one from Target when I first started practicing yoga. Had everything I needed to get started. I purchased again from Amazon as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: luv2shop

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Buying the kit saved me a few dollars, as well as shipped for free (which saved me the cost of running to various brick and mortar stores to get the individual mat, block and belt). I haven't checked out the DVD so do not consider this review inclusive of it's quality. Also, yes, the mat is about 1/4" thin. You shouldn't be using it as a mattress, but why would you have thought you could in the first place?
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Pollack

customer_reviews.title: Great for any yogi
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my yoga routines at home and it’s perfect. The mat, block, and strap are good quality and they are good essentials to get you started with your practice. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Davis

customer_reviews.title: The block is nice and firm
customer_reviews.text: The mat is extremely thin for a "yoga" mat. The price is decent for the set though. I have not once viewed the DVD. I just wanted the block and the mat. I use a different mat though. The block is nice and firm, but squishy at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Ste Le

customer_reviews.title: No DVD
customer_reviews.text: I just received my order, and it is missing the DVD. The box says it includes a digital download but, the DVD isn't in the box either.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I do love the kit and I think it is well worth the price. I thought the beginner DVD would have a little more history of yoga and break down the moves to understand the proper technique, but the kit is really what I purchased. The mat, block, and strap I think are a great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: This starter kit is okay. The mat is decent, although it is sort of slippery and the DVD was just not to my liking. However, it is a good deal for the price and a great way to get started with yoga.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Great beginners kit.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great package deal! I love the markings on the mat, they help me be more mindful of my footing, although I'm still slipping just a bit even in bare feet. The block and strap seem of good quality, I haven't used them a whole lot yet. The DVD is my favorite part. Rodney Yee has a very relaxing voice and I like his teaching style.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Merrill

customer_reviews.title: NOT Anti-slip
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and everything was as it stated however yoga mat does slide during practice if your not careful
customer_reviews.author: Kyra

customer_reviews.title: ... mat and everything came as described and is a nice set. Only issue is with the "Beginners" video
customer_reviews.text: The mat and everything came as described and is a nice set. Only issue is with the "Beginners" video, not sure what they think a beginner is but the pace is far beyond beginner I barely had time to get into a pose before he was on to the next and the by the time I get to the next he's 2 -3 poses ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Mat
customer_reviews.text: I love the mat, the block and the strap the DVD is not the best but it does introduce you to Yoga but I will say I found it a little boring and not really much of a workout but the scenery is pretty and the music is not bad so overall for an intro DVD it is not bad
customer_reviews.author: bookworm1026

customer_reviews.title: belt and tape were a nice addition to the kit and she has used everything
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter she had been taking yoga for a while and needed a new mat. The block, belt and tape were a nice addition to the kit and she has used everything.
customer_reviews.author: cbrie

customer_reviews.title: starter kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a really wonderful starter kit. The block and strap are fine quality. The mat is like all other mats and is not as sticky as you wish it would be at first but this will go away with time... it will get better. The lighter areas are actually more slip resistant than the rest of the mat. Also, the video is good for a beginner. There are only two programs on the video but they are worth the few dollars spent on the whole kit. I'd recommend this to anyone wanted a yoga mat.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Blair

customer_reviews.title: very well priced beginners kit with good mat and props..
customer_reviews.text: This a very good beginner's yoga mat kit..the prop strap and mat are great and I like the markings so you can adjust your feet to be parallel with the markings..the DVD is interesting to watch but I dont think it is useful for a beginner..also my opinion would be that most beginners would want to start off a little more alowly
customer_reviews.author: J.R. Collier

customer_reviews.title: This mat shredded bits off within the first few days ...
customer_reviews.text: This mat shredded bits off within the first few days. After a month of normal daily use it is continually shredding and I can't return it because I waited too long.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner mat and block. Ignore dvd.
customer_reviews.text: The mat and block are good quality for beginners. I lost the strap as I never used it. The dvd is trash. Unless your idea of yoga is just laying on the floor for a hour.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Lester

customer_reviews.title: This product looks great but it did NOT come with everything advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product looks great but it did NOT come with everything advertised. Even the box says it comes with a mat, DVD, block, and straps. I only received the mat. I'm not at all happy. I am currently deployed and cannot return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Love this mat
customer_reviews.text: They shipped it really fast. I had it in 2 day's. it came just like it was described and I will probably buy from them a lot more.. no issues or problems with anything and it's a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora

customer_reviews.title: great mat
customer_reviews.text: The mat and accessories are great. I love them but I did not like the video that came along with it. I just went and purchased another video. This kit is perfect for the starter and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Prime addict

customer_reviews.title: Gift for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my mom to help her expand her workout options. She had only done yoga once before and really liked it, but didn't know where to start - so i got her this kit and she was very pleased. Arrived very quickly!
customer_reviews.author: CErvin

customer_reviews.title: The color is great and it works well for following at home videos
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mother in law who is starting up at doing yoga. The color is great and it works well for following at home videos.
customer_reviews.author: pprbckwrtr

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy with the mat aesthetically
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the mat aesthetically. The colors are vibrant and look great! However, maybe my feet just sweat too much, but I can't stop slipping and sliding on this mat. Went back to using the bare floor.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Brown

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this whole set, I'm short limbed so the brick helps a lot, the mat is wonderful. And the yoga DVD I haven't explored much on past the daily yoga session b/c i feel so good after doing it I haven't moved on to explore more yet haha.
customer_reviews.author: Slyrouth

customer_reviews.title: Nice set. A little thinner mat than I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. A little thinner mat than I was hoping for with a bad knee, but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jan P.

customer_reviews.title: Its a good set
customer_reviews.text: For the price you get a fairly good set. I AM a beginner so I have little experience but I was satisfied with this set. I watched the video once but found online videos I liked better.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad set. Not spectacular either. The mat is just thick enough to use on a tile floor. The strap and block are great. I love the color. I just wish the mat felt like it would last longer. DVD is alright for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: J.T.

customer_reviews.title: good start
customer_reviews.text: just what I needed to get that start in something that I always had wanted to get in to and this is easy and fun to follow. am happy with the product and easy to follow dvd instructional guide.
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The video from the set is Very informative but the mat very very very thin
customer_reviews.author: Ashante

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good beginners kit and the mat is perfect for balance ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good beginners kit and the mat is perfect for balance poses especially. It is thin, but not too thin.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great strap. Block is great
customer_reviews.text: Great strap. Block is great. Disc isn't the best. Matt has plastic smell that is tough to get rid of, but overall great package.
customer_reviews.author: younggun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Start!!
customer_reviews.text: If you never done yoga before or just starting out, this kit is perfect. I would never buy the block or straps if it didn't came with the kit. Sure, the mat is not amazing, but you can always get better one once you become a pro!!
customer_reviews.author: Dyllan

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set. I liked the color selections that were offered as it was for myself and my boyfriend. Wish the dvd that came with it was a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Payne

customer_reviews.title: Everything You Need!
customer_reviews.text: It's a complete kit and it delivered the promise. What I love the most (and just realized it) is yes, the blocks on the mat is really helpful to position your body correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Hove not used it yet but i love the color
customer_reviews.text: Hove not used it yet but i love the color.... The CD will not work in any of my computer or PSP etc, and that is what has made me discouraged from using them...
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Only One Dist Included for this package...not two as advertized
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting two DVD disks...only received one DVD Disk... beginners work out only... Mat, Brick, and Yoga Strap was as per advertised. I was some what disappointed in the work out disks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A
customer_reviews.text: As described ... would probably work better if I actually used it which I don't do very often : /
customer_reviews.author: Linda

product_meta.title: Gaiam Beginner's Yoga Starter Kit (Yoga Mat, Yoga Block, Yoga Strap)
product_meta.description:
Begin your yoga practice with all the tools necessary to master the basic skills. In a quick tutorial, yoga expert Rodney Yee teaches you how to use the included alignment yoga mat, brick and strap to build a solid foundation. Whether you’re looking for increased flexibility or a workout that challenges the body as a whole, the Yoga Beginner’s Kit is an ideal way to ease yoga into your daily routine. Kit also includes alignment yoga mat, yoga block, 6’ yoga strap and two full-length yoga workouts, plus a seated meditation preparation routine. Note: Packaging May Vary to include workouts on DVD or via Online Streaming.

AMAZON.COM
Begin your yoga practice with all the tools necessary to master the basic skills. In a quick tutorial, yoga expert Rodney Yee teaches you how to use the included alignment yoga mat, brick and strap to build a solid foundation. Whether you're looking for increased flexibility or a workout that challenges the body as a whole, the Yoga Beginner's Kit is an ideal way to ease yoga into your daily routine. Kit also includes an alignment yoga mat, a yoga brick, a six-foot yoga strap and two full-length yoga workouts, plus a seated meditation preparation routine. 

 What's in the Box? 

 * Two full-length yoga workouts and props training with Yoga Beginner's Experience DVD (lessons detailed below) 
 * Bonus seated guided meditation 
 * Yoga brick for proper positioning and support 
 * Alignment yoga mat to help guide hand and foot placement 
 * Yoga strap to lengthen and align stretches; 6-feet long 

 A.M. Yoga: 20 minutes
Get a productive start to the day with this 20-minute workout designed to open your body and center your mind. Taking a few minutes in the morning to find clarity and peace can give meaning to the rest of your day. 

 Daily Yoga: 20 minutes
This gentle program will help increase circulation and mobility and invigorate you when you feel low on energy. Concludes with a restful and rejuvenating three-minute conscious relaxation. 

 Prop Intro: 8 minutes
Learn how yoga props (brick, strap and mat) can guide you into good habits as you cultivate your yoga practice. With proper technique, these tools will have you moving like an expert from the very start. 

 Seated Meditation Preparation: 10 minutes
Before you enter into meditation, take a few minutes to prepare your body and mind. These simple stretches ready you for a deeper state of consciousness. The perfect end to an active yoga session. 

 About Gaiam
Gaiam was created as a lifestyle company with the vision that, given a choice, people would choose a lifestyle that is healthy and life enhancing, for themselves, their families and the Earth. The Gaiam lifestyle is a vote for individual health as well as the future sustainability of the Earth's resources. Gaiam strives to provide customers with alternatives to traditional products by offering natural or healthy versions that compare with the style, quality and price of conventional products. 

 Gaiam's goal is to become the trusted source and unifying brand for Lifestyle of Health and Sustainability (LOHAS) participants. They understand that the opportunity to affect people's lives with information and products is both a privilege and a responsibility. Gaiam believes in the concept of Conscious Commerce, the practice of making purchasing decisions based on personal values and beliefs. It takes into consideration all the aspects of our lives and the impact we have upon the planet. Research indicates this concept appeals to approximately 50 million people in the U.S. alone. Gaiam's strategy in delivering the distinctive quality for which they are known is to partner with experts in health/wellness, eco-living and personal development to develop proprietary products that meet our customers' needs with meaningful solutions. 

 The name GAIAM is a fusion of the words Gaia (the name of Mother Earth from the Minoan civilization in ancient Crete), and I am reminds us that we are all interconnected with the Earth, the air and water, and very much a part of this living system that sustains us all.
feature_bullets: YOGA KIT: Complete kit with everything needed to master the basic skills of yoga, including a yoga mat, yoga block and yoga strap
YOGA MAT: 3mm fashion print yoga mat is lightweight, yet durable with a non-slip textured surface
YOGA BLOCK: Foam yoga brick (3"x 6"x 9") helps extend, support and deepen stretches
YOGA STRAP: 6 ft. yoga strap with durable metal D-ring helps increase range of motion, achieve more challenging positions and sustain poses for longer periods of time
INCLUDED: Two full-length yoga workouts, plus props training bonus with renowned yoga instructor Rodney Yee (Packaging May Vary to include workouts on DVD or via Online Streaming)
